item.title: 6 Shocking Side Effects of Tulsi ( Holy Basil)
item.dc:creator: Bharat Sharma
item.description:
Tulsi has several adverse effects that may make you reconsider using it. Tulsi, often known as holy basil, is thought to be a magical cure-all herb. Given the wide range of benefits it provides, this is unsurprising. Tulsi is a common ingredient in many home treatments.
